SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT QNA_NO , MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NICK , QNA_TITLE , TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI') "REPORT_DATE" , ANS_CONFIRM FROM QNA JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE QNA_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ANS_CONFIRM ASC, QNA_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT QNA_NO , MEM_NO , MEM_NICK , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , NVL(ANS_CONTENT, ' ') "ANS_CONTENT" , ANS_DATE FROM QNA JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE QNA_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NO , FILE_ORIGIN , FILE_CHANGE , FILE_PATH FROM QNA_FILE WHERE QNA_NO = ? AND FILE_STATUS = 'Y'
